Advanced Capabilities

Built for modern development teams requiring enterprise-grade automated code quality assurance, security validation, and intelligent insights.

Automated Code Review

Comprehensive analysis covering code quality, security vulnerabilities, performance bottlenecks, and architectural patterns with OWASP Top 10 validation and industry best practices.

  • Static analysis
  • Security scanning
  • Performance profiling
  • Architecture review

Multi-Model Intelligence

Parallel execution across OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude 3, and Google Gemini Pro for statistically significant insights with cross-validation and consensus building.

  • GPT-4 integration
  • Claude 3 support
  • Gemini Pro analysis
  • Cross-validation

Consensus Engine

Advanced algorithms combine multiple AI perspectives using statistical methods to eliminate bias, improve accuracy, and provide confidence scores for recommendations.

  • Statistical analysis
  • Bias elimination
  • Confidence scoring
  • Consensus algorithms

Enterprise Performance

Asynchronous processing with intelligent load balancing, connection pooling, and resource optimization for handling large codebases at enterprise scale.

  • Async processing
  • Load balancing
  • Resource optimization
  • Scalable architecture

MCP Integration

Seamless integration with Claude Code through Model Context Protocol, enabling AI-powered development workflows directly in your IDE and CI/CD pipelines.

  • Claude Code integration
  • IDE plugins
  • CI/CD integration
  • Workflow automation

Security First

Built-in vulnerability detection, secure credential management, encrypted communications, and compliance-ready architecture meeting enterprise security standards.

  • Vulnerability scanning
  • Secure credentials
  • Encrypted comms
  • Compliance ready
SOC 2 Type II Compliant • GDPR Ready • Enterprise Security

Quantum Code

Enterprise-grade multi-model AI code analysis for modern development teams.
